summary: Utility script that translates a TensorFlow checkpoint of a DimeNet++ model into an equivalent PyTorch model by loading the TensorFlow weights, mapping them to the PyTorch architecture, and saving the resulting checkpoint.
business_intent: Enable seamless reuse of pretrained DimeNet++ models originally trained in TensorFlow within PyTorch workflows, reducing the need for retraining and accelerating deployment in molecular property prediction pipelines.
